properties.displayName: _CSGP: IFEO Injection - Registry value was created or set
properties.description:
Detects when a registry value is created or set within the "Image File Execution Options" hive. This activity shouldn't happen normally and could potentially indicate compromise.

Handling Guidance: Investigate the process execution, host and account. Reach out to any involved users and confirm if this was intentional. Escalate to the Endpoint Security Team for further investigation
